answers.answer: I have my 3 hour next week :/ idk how to feel about it. I failed the 1 hour by 3 points. I was told other signs of gestational diabetes was measuring bigger but my Dr said I was measuring perfect for my due date. So idk....he did not seem worried, he was more worried about my low iron. He gave me a long speech about how I need to make sure I take the iron pills every day
I failed my one hour test two and just took my 3 hours test yesterday. Its the same test just longer and they take more blood out oh and the drink is more sweet but I hope y'all pass it (: good luck!
if you do end up with gestational diabetes, they'll just have you on a specific diet and have you check your blood sugar. just for the safety of your baby. hopefully you pass!
Im doing my three hour right now almost done. It ***** but im sure it will be fine
I failed my one hour and then passed the three hour. But nothing to worry about. More than likely you will pass and if not you will just have to really watch what you eat. Good luck!
Ugh thank you ladies mine was way over!!! It was 214 :( I hope all is well with you mommies too. But when I read about all this most women have to do the 3 hour test too. But I'm still nervous

question: So I failed my 1 hour test now I am doing my 3 hour test tomorrow and I'm super nervous :( should I be??
title: super nervous
